# MTLFeatureSet.iOS_GPUFamily3_v4

**Case**

The GPU family 3, version 4 feature set for iOS.

## Declaration

```swift
case iOS_GPUFamily3_v4
```

## Discussion

This feature set corresponds with Apple A9 devices running iOS 12.

## iOS GPU family 3

- **MTLFeatureSet.iOS_GPUFamily3_v3**: The GPU family 3, version 3 feature set for iOS.
- **MTLFeatureSet.iOS_GPUFamily3_v2**: The GPU family 3, version 2 feature set for iOS.
- **MTLFeatureSet.iOS_GPUFamily3_v1**: The GPU family 3, version 1 feature set for iOS.
